verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I was sure by now
God You would have reached down
And wiped our tears away
Stepped in and saved the day
But once again I'll say Amen
And it's still rainin'

verse.name: p1
verse.lines:
As the thunder rolls, I barely hear You whisper
Through the rain I'm with You
And as Your mercy falls, I'll raise my hands
And praise the God who gives and takes away

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
And I'll praise You in this storm
And I will lift my hands
For You are who You are no matter where I am
And ev'ry tear I've cried
You hold in Your hand You never left my side
And though my heart is torn
I will praise You in this storm

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I remember when
I stumbled in the wind
You heard my cry to You
And raised me up again
But my strength is almost gone
How can I carry on
If I can't find You

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
I lift my eyes unto the hills
Where does my help come from
My help comes from the Lord
The Maker of heaven and earth
